title: Fix Admin Center backend initialization hang

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the backend access control initialization logic that is causing the Admin Center to hang on 'Connecting to backend...' indefinitely despite successfully detecting the authenticated principal (whlz5-24wky-cak5n-dcfue-ja2x5-...)

quotes: Ok this is what I am getting now and that is it
Admin Center is stuck on 'Initializing...' and 'Connecting to backend...'

acceptanceCriteria: The backend initialization completes successfully without hanging
The Admin Center proceeds past the 'Connecting to backend...' spinner
The authenticated principal is properly registered in the backend access control system

requirements.text: Ensure the frontend properly receives and handles the completion of backend access control initialization so the Admin Center can render the full dashboard interface

quotes: The frontend can now see your authenticated principal, but the backend is still having trouble completing the initialization

acceptanceCriteria: The Admin Center transitions from loading state to displaying the full dashboard once initialization completes
Error handling is in place for initialization failures
The user can access all admin functionality after successful initialization

constraints: Do not change the single-actor backend architecture
Preserve the existing access control structure and role-based permissions
Maintain compatibility with the current Internet Identity authentication flow
nonGoals: Adding new admin features or dashboard sections
Changing the UI design of the Admin Center
